detectors.description:
MetaMaskSwapToken.slitherConstructorVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MetaMaskSwapToken.sol#14-75) uses literals with too many digits:
	- initialSupply = 100000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MetaMaskSwapToken.sol#16)

detectors.description:

	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MetaMaskSwapToken.sol#5)

	- MetaMaskSwapToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MetaMaskSwapToken.sol#32-34)

	- MetaMaskSwapToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MetaMaskSwapToken.sol#59-63)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MetaMaskSwapToken.sol#9)
	- MetaMaskSwapToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MetaMaskSwapToken.sol#36-45)
